TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TimerCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TimerCallback(state As Object)
type TimerCallback = delegate of obj -> unit

param.name: state
param.span: 物件，含有關於這個委派所叫用方法的應用程式特定資訊；或 。

span.span: An object containing application-specific information relevant to the method invoked by this delegate, or .

summary.span: 表示處理來自 的呼叫的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles calls from a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`TimerCallback`來指定方法所呼叫的委派。Use a `TimerCallback` delegate to specify the method that is called by a . 這個方法不會建立計時器; 的執行緒中執行它會執行另一個執行緒集區的執行緒所提供的系統。This method does not execute in the thread that created the timer; it executes in a separate thread pool thread that is provided by the system. `TimerCallback`委派叫用方法一次之後經過的開始時間，, 並繼續它之前的計時器間隔中一次叫用呼叫方法時，或直到方法呼叫的間隔值。The `TimerCallback` delegate invokes the method once after the start time elapses, and continues to invoke it once per timer interval until the method is called, or until the method is called with the interval value . > [!NOTE] > 之後就可能發生的回呼方法多載呼叫，因為計時器佇列中由執行緒集區執行緒執行的回呼。Callbacks can occur after the method overload has been called, because the timer queues callbacks for execution by thread pool threads. 您可以使用等候，直到所有的回呼已完成的方法多載。You can use the method overload to wait until all callbacks have completed. 當計時器建構，而且無法變更，會指定計時器委派。The timer delegate is specified when the timer is constructed, and cannot be changed. 開始時間`Timer`傳入`dueTime`參數`Timer`建構函式，並在期限傳入`period`參數。The start time for a `Timer` is passed in the `dueTime` parameter of the `Timer` constructors, and the period is passed in the `period` parameter. 如需示範如何建立及使用的範例`TimerCallback`委派，請參閱。For an example that demonstrates creating and using a `TimerCallback` delegate, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立與所用的委派`Timer`類別。The following code example shows how to create the delegate used with the `Timer` class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Timer/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Timer/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Timer/VB/source.vb#1)]
